dd: What did Zhan-ge eat today? I asked you what you ate today.
gg: Wrong wrong wrong~ I was wrong~

dd: What did Xiao-laoshi eat today?

dd: What did Xiao-laoshi eat today?
gg: I- You- I ate the stir-fried rice noodles Lao Wang bought for me.

gg: You're really getting less and less respectful of your elders.

gg: I admit that I'm old.
